column2: Data Retention and Deletion   We will retain your data for as long as you use the online services and for a reasonable time thereafter. If you'd like to delete, modify or update the data that you provided via the online services please use the settings on the online services or contact us at privacy@nbcuni.com and we will respond in a reasonable time. Please note that some or all of this data may be required in order for the online services to function properly, and we may be required to retain certain information by law.
